name: pwawp-blog
description: Progressive Web App Wordpress theme demo

scripts.dev: npm run clean && webpack -d --config webpack.config.dev.js && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-wpfiles && npm run make-dist-zip
scripts.prod: npm run clean && webpack -p --env=prod --progress --profile --colors --config webpack.config.prod.js && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-wpfiles && npm run make-dist-zip
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/service-worker.js dist/
scripts.copy-wpfiles: cp wp-files/* dist/ && cp dist/home.html dist/index.php && cp dist/home.html dist/index.html

author: Simon Ho
